text: Kim Kardashian opened up in her cover shoot for Elle and says baby number 4 would be her last! RELATED : Kim Kardashian West Partners With Lionsgate For Facebook Series Kim K got candid for her interview in Elle ’ s April issue. Following the severe complications during her first two pregnancies, Kim and Kanye West opted to use a surrogate for baby Chicago West. Now between pregnancy complications and KimYe ’ s busy careers, the KUWTK star thinks baby number four would be her last. When asked if she would consider having a fourth child, Kim replied, “ I dunno, ” she answered with a sigh. “ My home and my heart feel really full right now, in the best way. ” Kim then confirmed that the fourth child would
